lead_paragraph: Rio de Janeiro will deliver a successful Olympic Games, the International Olympic Committee (IOC) said on Sunday, despite delays in preparations, lack of funds and the country suffering from its biggest political and economic turmoil in decades.

headline.print_headline: Troubled Rio Games Coming Together, Says IOC
headline.main: Troubled Rio Games Coming Together, Says IOC
